issue.title: [CF 27] unit reaction in 1.5 does not work
issue.body:
How to reproduce:
just set unit reaction for hostile unit only. then mark hostile unit. Icon should be shown but it does not work. it worked in 1.4.9a.
in 1.4.9a when i mark hostile target some of my cooldowns were visible on screen. in 1.5 not.


> Posted by CurseForge user thoonek | Imported from CurseForge issue #27 | Raw
